text: Waterloo Maple Inc. (Maplesoft) is a Canadian software company. They are in Waterloo, Ontario. They are most well known for creating the Maple computer algebra system. Waterloo Maple Inc. was registrated under the name Waterloo Maple Software in April 1988. ==Related pages== *Maple (CAS) == Other websites == * Maplesoft Corporate Website * Symbolic Computation Group website Category:1988 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Ontario Category:Technology companies of Canada Category:Waterloo, Ontario
title: Waterloo Maple
